metadata.title: CVE-2023-52783 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:wangxun: fix kernel panic due to null pointer When the device uses a customsubsystem vendor ID, the function wx_sw_init() returns before the memory of'wx->mac_table' is allocated. The null pointer will causes the kernelpanic.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
